title: Assertion Failed
body:
_Github issues are primarily for reporting bugs or getting assistance with development-related items. If you have a question or need support with our product, please email support@mycrypto.com for faster attention._

_If you are reporting an issue, please use the template below so we can reproduce, determine the cause of the issue, and fix it! If you are not reporting an issue, delete this entire thing and type away. Thanks!_

---

### Assertion Failed #3890
 Closed 18Mar2021 //  But has now restarted the same issue again:  **Pasted below** fyi

...

### What exactly were you doing when you encountered this issue?

...Give us some steps to reproduce...

### How were you accessing your wallet?

...Ledger, Trezor, MetaMask, Private Key, Keystore File, Mnemonic Phrase?...

### Description of Your Machine

- Browser:
- Browser version:
- Operating system:
- Device:
- MyCrypto.com vs Desktop Application?
- MyCrypto Version Number:

### Console Logs / Screenshots

...
>>

Just experiencing the same issue as before 2 nights ago on Monday, 29/03/2021 
![Screen Shot 2021-03-18 at 18 59 43](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/49276879/113210440-22a08300-926c-11eb-90af-1251cfc46226.png)


using MEW via MyCrypto APP - Trying to send RIF / changed Network from ETH to RSK for RBTC
/ connected to TW / / Getting Red page error message Assertion Failed (attached here bellow)

But on MEW.com web section (no Red page error) cannot locate the funds part in the list of RBTC addresses / only can physically see them on the actual RSK Explorer that the funds for RBTC and RIF are there intacked OK

Please kindly help us on this matter. Thanks in Advance

Best,
Nural

Screen Shot 2021-03-18 at 18 59 43
Duplicate of #3890. The issue was fixed in #3900, which should be included in the next release (likely this week). You can use [app.mycrypto.com](https://app.mycrypto.com) as a workaround.

Hi Maarten,

You can use app.mycrypto.com as a workaround. / but we are getting the same
issue Assertion Failed on MyCrypto APP again.

Regards,
Nural

On Wed, 31 Mar 2021 at 22:27, Maarten Zuidhoorn ***@***.***>
